data.budgetEvidence: Original Budget: INR 5-10 lacs; Converted USD: approx 6,000 - 12,000; Company size: 1-10 employees; Industry: IT Services (SME).
data.authorityEvidence: Lead's role: Marketing Manager; ICP decision-makers: CTO, VP Engineering, Head of Engineering.
data.needEvidence: Engagement Intent: Outsourcing / Staff Augmentation / Product Build; Internal engineering team = 0; Budget exists; Timeline 2-4 months indicates urgency.
data.timelineEvidence: Timeline: 2-4 Months; Client looking to start/deliver within 2-4 months.
data.overallAssessment: Qualified with caveats: clear need and urgency; authority and firmographic alignment weaker.
data.qualificationReason: Strong need and timely engagement with external resources; modest budget; however decision-maker risk and very small company size reduce ICP alignment.
data.disQualificationReason: No senior decision-maker identified; company headcount 1-10; budgeted in INR; ICP targets 20-1000 employees; US/India mixed location complicates currency and procurement; potential misalignment with ICP.
data.recommendedAction: Qualify further with a stakeholder who has purchasing authority; attempt to reach CTO/VP Eng; propose a low-risk pilot or proof-of-concept; prepare budget-friendly engagement options and offshore/nearshore models; schedule discovery call to map decision flow.

leadInfo.location: Mumbai | New York City, New York, United States

success_criteria: Build one central lead intelligence system that:
Fills gaps by asking follow-ups (not guessing)
Scores how good the lead is
Sends only Sales-ready leads to CRM
So Sales gets complete, structured, high-quality leads, not raw enquiries.
